Far Overworld.requires: (|block_interaction| and |crafting| and |stairs| and |mining| and |block_loot| and |sneaking|) or (|safe_fall| and |jump|)

Nether.requires: |block_interaction| and |crafting| and ((|mining| and |block_loot|) or (|entity_interaction| and (|attack| or |block_loot|) and |mob_loot|))
